content: Hey, wanna try... running wild in the mountains with me? Racing through the wind, free as can be~ bhan!
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-初次见面-1012巴彦_联机对话（CB1）

content: Oh, a new friend? Are you here to visit our Protoplanet? {A得意}Welcome! I'm <style=NpcName>Bhadra</style>.
